title: First Hello
description: Each member shares their name, year, and one welcome cue to open the semester.

title: Choose Our Ritual
description: As a pod, decide on a 10-minute weekly ritual (tea circle, study sprint, etc.).

title: Two-Step Invite
description: Each member invites one peer outside the pod to a low-stakes hangout.

title: Midday Meetup
description: For commuter pods: meet between 11:30 and 1:30 near transit or parking.

title: Oops/Ouch Practice
description: Run a 2-minute reset using the Oops/Ouch script to practice conflict repair.

title: Language Ally
description: Use a visual agenda and slower pacing once; try a translation app if needed.

title: Club Bridge
description: Attend one organization meeting or campus event together as a pod.

title: Low-Stimulus Social
description: Host a quiet meetup for half the session in a sensory-friendly space.

title: Community Service Sprint
description: Plan a one-hour micro-service project that supports your zone community.

title: Study Sprint Marathon
description: Run a 90-minute focus sprint with pomodoro check-ins and share study hacks.

title: Mentorship Coffee Chain
description: Pair up with another pod for coffee chats and swap mentorship questions.

title: Wellness Walk
description: Host a 30-minute movement break and share wellbeing check-ins en route.

title: Cultural Swap Night
description: Trade snacks, music, or traditions that reflect your cultures and identities.

title: Finals Buddy System
description: Partner for finals prep, set accountability goals, and share resources.
